Translation.Value: /tpa (playerName) - Sends a teleport request.
/tpa accept - Accepts your latest TPA request.
/tpa deny - Denys your latest TPA request.
/tpa abort - Abort your pending request.
Could not find that player!
Teleport failed, the player is in a car.
Teleport failed, you can't teleport in a car.
Time left for another request: {0}
Your teleport will initiate in {0} {1}.
You do not have permission to send TPA requests.
You do not have permission to accept TPA requests.
You may only send requests every {0} seconds.
You may not teleport when bleeding, resend TPA when you're safe.
You may not teleport when you're hurt!
TPA allows you to request a teleport to another player.
Your teleportation has been successful!
You've accepted {0} TPA request!
You've denied {0}'s request!
{0} accepted your tpa request!
{0} accepted your tpa request and will teleport in {1} {2}.
You've accepted {0}'s tpa request and they will teleport in {1} {2}.
{0} denied your tpa request!
You have sent a tpa request to {0}
{0} sent you a tpa request, do /tpa accept to accept!
You already have a request pending to this player.
You have no requests available!
You have aborted your TPA request.
